name: money-matters
description: Full-stack application with Angular frontend and NestJS backend

scripts.frontend:build: cd frontend && cmd /c npm run build
scripts.backend:start: cd backend && cmd /c npm run start
scripts.backend:start:dev: cd backend && cmd /c npm run start:dev
scripts.backend:build: cd backend && cmd /c npm run build
scripts.install:all: cmd /c npm run frontend:install && cmd /c npm run backend:install
scripts.start:dev: start cmd /c "cd frontend && npm start" && start cmd /c "cd backend && npm run start:dev"
scripts.build:all: cmd /c npm run frontend:build && cmd /c npm run backend:build
